font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">&nbsp;</P>\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">To make the most of Designer, here are some <A href=\"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094246\" target=\"_self\">guidelines</A> on how to get started:</P>\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">&nbsp;</P>\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">PowerPoint recommends that you follow the guidelines below when you're creating a custom template in order to optimize it for Designer. An asterisk (*) denotes optional recommendations that won't be used by&nbsp;PowerPoint Designer today.</P>\n</SECTION>\n<SECTION class=\"ocpSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #363636; display: block; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web regular&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;\">\n<H2 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp&amp;quot;,helvetica,tahoma,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.33; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 48px; padding-bottom: 0px;\">Define your theme colors and fonts</H2>\n<UL style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: block; font-size: 1.6em; list-style-image: url(&amp;quot; data: image/png; base64,ivborw0kggoaaaansuheugaaaauaaaahaqmaaad6arwtaaaablbmvex///+agibiznovaaaaaxrstlmaqobyzgaaabdjrefuef49wsebaaaag7d3t4zkim30bcumbnn/pqx4aaaaaelftksuqmcc&amp;quot;); list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 12px; margin: 30px 0px 30px 0px;\">\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Make sure your theme colors have enough contrast between the light and dark variants (i.e. between <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Light 1</STRONG> &amp; <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Light 2</STRONG> and <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Dark 1</STRONG> &amp; <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Dark 2</STRONG>).</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Define accent colors (<STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Accent 1, 2, 3</STRONG>, etc.) in order of priority, as Designer uses colors in this order.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Ensure accent colors contrast sufficiently against the primary theme colors. This will ensure that icons are visible and accessible.</P>\n</LI>\n</UL>\n</SECTION>\n<SECTION class=\"ocpSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #363636; display: block; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web regular&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;\">\n<H2 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp&amp;quot;,helvetica,tahoma,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.33; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 48px; padding-bottom: 0px;\">Design the Slide Master</H2>\n<UL style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: block; font-size: 1.6em; list-style-image: url(&amp;quot; data: image/png; base64,ivborw0kggoaaaansuheugaaaauaaaahaqmaaad6arwtaaaablbmvex///+agibiznovaaaaaxrstlmaqobyzgaaabdjrefuef49wsebaaaag7d3t4zkim30bcumbnn/pqx4aaaaaelftksuqmcc&amp;quot;); list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 12px; margin: 30px 0px 30px 0px;\">\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Ensure any&nbsp;background images are compressed and in the correct format. File size is important because layouts are uploaded to Designer on-the-fly.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Use Background Styles whenever appropriate (rather than explicit background colors) to help Designer choose the correct text colors for suggestions.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Keep families of layouts under a single Slide Master, as Designer only suggests layouts from the current Slide Master.</P>\n<DIV class=\"ocpAlert\" style=\"background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-color: #f3f3f3; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position-x: 0%; background-position-y: 0%; background-repeat: repeat; background-size: auto; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-top: 16px; padding: 6px 8% 6px 3.5%;\">\n<P class=\"ocpAlertSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\"><STRONG class=\"ocpNote\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.5; margin: 20px 0px 5px 0px;\">Note:</STRONG>&nbsp;For example, if you want users to have a mix of light and dark layouts, these should be kept under a single Slide Master. But if you want users to only get light-themed suggestions for light-themed slides, and dark-themed suggestions for dark-themed slides, then there should be two separate light and dark slide masters.</P>\n</DIV>\n</LI>\n</UL>\n</SECTION>\n<SECTION class=\"ocpSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #363636; display: block; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web regular&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;\">\n<H2 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp&amp;quot;,helvetica,tahoma,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.33; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 48px; padding-bottom: 0px;\">Design visually distinct layouts for each slide scenario</H2>\n<UL style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: block; font-size: 1.6em; list-style-image: url(&amp;quot; data: image/png; base64,ivborw0kggoaaaansuheugaaaauaaaahaqmaaad6arwtaaaablbmvex///+agibiznovaaaaaxrstlmaqobyzgaaabdjrefuef49wsebaaaag7d3t4zkim30bcumbnn/pqx4aaaaaelftksuqmcc&amp;quot;); list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 12px; margin: 30px 0px 30px 0px;\">\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Create a minimum of 15 layouts in each Slide Master to enable Designer support.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Create at least one layout with a Title and the largest possible content placeholder (to be used for&nbsp;SmartArt graphic and Icon suggestions).</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Though client needs vary, these scenarios for slide layouts are very common:&nbsp;</P>\n<UL style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: block; font-size: 1em; list-style-image: url(&amp;quot; data: image/png; base64,ivborw0kggoaaaansuheugaaaauaaaahaqmaaad6arwtaaaablbmvex///+agibiznovaaaaaxrstlmaqobyzgaaabdjrefuef49wsebaaaag7d3t4zkim30bcumbnn/pqx4aaaaaelftksuqmcc&amp;quot;); list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 15px; margin: 5px 0px 30px -1px;\">\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title Only</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Short Message (with or without title)</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Section Header</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title + Content (larger amount of text)</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title + Two Content</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title + Two Content + Headings (Comparison)</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title + Picture</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title + Picture + Caption</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title + Two Picture + Captions</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Title + Large text + Picture</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Picture layout suitable for screenshots&nbsp;</P>\n</LI>\n</UL>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Create multiple alternatives for common slide scenarios, as Designer won't automatically show suggestions if fewer than three suggestions are available.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">When possible, avoid creating layouts that are too similar visually. Otherwise, the suggestions may look virtually identical at thumbnail size in the Design Ideas pane.</P>\n</LI>\n</UL>\n</SECTION>\n<SECTION class=\"ocpSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #363636; display: block; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web regular&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;\">\n<H2 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp&amp;quot;,helvetica,tahoma,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.33; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 48px; padding-bottom: 0px;\">Create and format placeholders on layouts</H2>\n<UL style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: block; font-size: 1.6em; list-style-image: url(&amp;quot; data: image/png; base64,ivborw0kggoaaaansuheugaaaauaaaahaqmaaad6arwtaaaablbmvex///+agibiznovaaaaaxrstlmaqobyzgaaabdjrefuef49wsebaaaag7d3t4zkim30bcumbnn/pqx4aaaaaelftksuqmcc&amp;quot;); list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 12px; margin: 30px 0px 30px 0px;\">\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Only pictures are placed inside Picture placeholders.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Text, SmartArt graphics, Icons, and other content are placed inside Content placeholders.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Content placeholders, generally, should not be placed directly on the edge of the slide, because text and&nbsp;SmartArt graphics may not have sufficient margins when placed in Content placeholders that extend to the slide edge. Picture placeholders, on the other hand, may go to the slide edge.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Avoid non-rectangular Content placeholders, as text and SmartArt graphics behave unexpectedly when placed inside non-rectangular placeholders.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">To apply styling to placeholders, right-click the placeholder and select <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Format Shape</STRONG> and apply the desired formatting. To apply picture formatting to Picture placeholders, change the Fill settings in <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Shape Options</STRONG> to <STRONG class=\"ocpLegacyBold\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Picture or texture fill </STRONG>and use a built-in texture, or an image of your own choosing, as the placeholder fill. Apply the desired formatting from the <STRONG class=\"ocpLegacyBold\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Picture Format </STRONG>contextual ribbon tab, and Designer will apply this formatting when it creates Design Ideas.</P>\n<DIV class=\"ocpAlert\" style=\"background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-color: #f3f3f3; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position-x: 0%; background-position-y: 0%; background-repeat: repeat; background-size: auto; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-top: 16px; padding: 6px 8% 6px 3.5%;\">\n<P class=\"ocpAlertSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\"><STRONG class=\"ocpNote\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.5; margin: 20px 0px 5px 0px;\">Note:</STRONG>&nbsp;When you use your own image as a \"dummy image\" for Picture placeholders, be aware of the image's file size to avoid inflating the overall file size of your template.</P>\n</DIV>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">If you intend for your template to support Footer placeholders, create these placeholders on every suitable layout. When non-empty Footer placeholders are on a user's slide, Designer only creates suggestions from layouts that also have Footer placeholders—to avoid deleting important content that may be in the original slide's footer.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Designer treats every placeholder as <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Shrink text on overflow</STRONG> when it creates Design Ideas. For placeholders that must use <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Resize shape to fit text</STRONG> AutoFit settings, resize the placeholder on the layout to the maximum size that it should occupy, so that Designer is able to use all of the available space on the slide.</P>\n<DIV class=\"ocpAlert\" style=\"background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-color: #f3f3f3; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position-x: 0%; background-position-y: 0%; background-repeat: repeat; background-size: auto; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-top: 16px; padding: 6px 8% 6px 3.5%;\">\n<P class=\"ocpAlertSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\"><STRONG class=\"ocpNote\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.5; margin: 20px 0px 5px 0px;\">Note:</STRONG>&nbsp;This will only be possible if placeholders inherit their AutoFit property from the Slide Master, so make sure to set this first on the Slide Master's placeholders before creating the layouts.</P>\n</DIV>\n</LI>\n</UL>\n</SECTION>\n<SECTION class=\"ocpSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #363636; display: block; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web regular&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;\">\n<H2 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp&amp;quot;,helvetica,tahoma,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.33; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 48px; padding-bottom: 0px;\">Test your template for arbitrary content uses</H2>\n<UL style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: block; font-size: 1.6em; list-style-image: url(&amp;quot; data: image/png; base64,ivborw0kggoaaaansuheugaaaauaaaahaqmaaad6arwtaaaablbmvex///+agibiznovaaaaaxrstlmaqobyzgaaabdjrefuef49wsebaaaag7d3t4zkim30bcumbnn/pqx4aaaaaelftksuqmcc&amp;quot;); list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 12px; margin: 30px 0px 30px 0px;\">\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Place a large amount of text into placeholders and check that the text does not overlap with logos, images, or other background content. Designer will only shrink text to keep it within the bounds of its placeholder -- if the placeholder itself overlaps background elements, the results may be unexpected.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Make sure that placeholders are sized to the maximum size they should occupy, as Designer will create suggestions with <STRONG class=\"ocpUI\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-weight: 700;\">Shrink Text to Fit</STRONG> AutoFit settings.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Test that placeholders can hold a wide range of text lengths, from a few words to long bulleted lists. Covering more scenarios allows Designer to make relevant recommendations in a wider range of situations.</P>\n</LI>\n<LI style=\"box-sizing: border-box; display: list-item; font-size: 1em; margin-left: 0px; margin-top: 18px; padding-left: 6px;\">\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Check any placeholders that layer or overlap pictures. Keep in mind a picture with the identical color could be used in that placeholder, making the overlay \"invisible.\" For example, when layering white text over a picture, keep in mind that a mostly white picture could be used in that placeholder. Consider creating a version of the overlay slide with dark text and with light text so that the user can choose the suggestion most appropriate for their image.</P>\n</LI>\n</UL>\n</SECTION>\n<SECTION class=\"ocpSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #363636; display: block; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web regular&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;\">\n<H2 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp&amp;quot;,helvetica,tahoma,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.33; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 48px; padding-bottom: 0px;\">Known limitations</H2>\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">PowerPoint Designer&nbsp;doesn't yet create suggestions for slides that include Tables or Charts.</P>\n</SECTION>\n<SECTION class=\"ocpSection\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #363636; display: block; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web regular&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;\">\n<H2 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_light&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe wp&amp;quot;,helvetica,tahoma,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.33; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 48px; padding-bottom: 0px;\">Talk to the product team about this feature</H2>\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">If you are using the features described here to make custom, branded templates, Microsoft would like to talk with you. Please leave a comment!</P>\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">&nbsp;</P>\n<P style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #2f2f2f; font-family: &amp;quot; segoe ui&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui web&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;segoe ui symbol&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;wf_segoe-ui_normal&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;helvetica neue&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;bbalpha sans&amp;quot;,&amp;quot;s60 sans&amp;quot;,arial,sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0px;\">Thank you!&nbsp;</P>\n</SECTION>","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Tue, 18 Jun 2019 17:21:27 +0000","feedId":10337,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"a70a67be36c77bd803cbd7919925cd8b","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"Richard Tso","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316639110},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:50:39","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:50:39","title":"Introducing – and Managing – Microsoft Search in Bing through Office 365 ProPlus","link":"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/office-365-blog/introducing-and-managing-microsoft-search-in-bing-through-office/ba-p/1110974","description":"<H2>Important!</H2>\n<P><BR /><STRONG>Based on customer feedback, we’re making a few changes to the plan to roll out the extension for Microsoft Search in Bing. Based on these changes, the rollout will not start with Version 2002. For more information about these changes, read this&nbsp;<A title=\"Original URL: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/office-365-blog/update-to-microsoft-search-in-bing-through-office-365-proplus/ba-p/1161030. Click or tap if you trust this link.\" href=\"https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcommunity.microsoft.com%2Ft5%2Foffice-365-blog%2Fupdate-to-microsoft-search-in-bing-through-office-365-proplus%2Fba-p%2F1161030&amp;data=02%7C01%7Cv-dysnod%40microsoft.com%7C00e1c98e5be949e9769908d7ae849e20%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C637169756915267281&amp;sdata=8oU970jm5daBP87mfSjYxpF9hZY1ZP8YbKDBFYT%2Fr%2BQ%3D&amp;reserved=0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" data-auth=\"Verified\">announcement</A>.</STRONG><BR /><BR />Customers tell us they want easier ways to manage their environments while delivering more productivity value to their employees. This includes helping people quickly find the information they need, a potentially frustrating prospect given the sheer and constantly growing volume of content within an organization. To help IT solve this -- and to do so in a way that is easy for you to manage -- we are offering the Microsoft Search in Bing extension to Office 365 ProPlus customers starting at the end of February.<SUP>1,2</SUP> To help you prepare, we want to share guidance on how you can configure Office 365 ProPlus updates to best meet your organization’s search needs.&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Microsoft Search in Bing</STRONG></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Bing is a gateway to <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftsearch/overview-microsoft-search\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Microsoft Search</A>, a unified enterprise search solution that provides contextual work-related information using data sources in Office 365 including SharePoint, Microsoft OneDrive for Business, and Exchange. Microsoft Search delivers personalized results surfaced by the Microsoft Graph&nbsp;to make search in your organization more effective, increase productivity, and save everyone time.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Employees can search for colleagues by typing the title, team name, or even office location into the address bar. They can also search for office location and get answers that show floor plans for directions. They can even get definitions for company acronyms.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>As part of Microsoft 365, <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftsearch/overview-microsoft-search\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Microsoft Search</A> is on by default for all Microsoft apps that support it. &nbsp;This update is designed to enable an accessible and familiar entry point for your users: a search engine.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><IFRAME src=\"https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/videoplayer/embed/RE4owM1\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"allowfullscreen\" style=\"width: 960px; height: 540px;\" class=\"video-iframe\"></IFRAME></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Deploy Microsoft Search through Office 365 ProPlus</STRONG></P>\n<P>You have told us that you want a single tool to deploy all desktop components of Office 365. To simplify the process of deploying Microsoft Search, we’re making the Microsoft Search in Bing extension available through Office 365 ProPlus with version 2002, alongside Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneDrive, and Teams. This extension will be&nbsp;installed with new installations&nbsp;of Office 365 ProPlus&nbsp;and when existing installations are updated.&nbsp;If Bing is already the default search engine, the extension&nbsp;will not&nbsp;get installed.&nbsp;</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Honor your users’ search preferences</STRONG></P>\n<P>If you don’t want to deploy the extension to your users, you can exclude it by using the&nbsp;<A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/deployoffice/overview-of-the-office-2016-deployment-tool\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Office Deployment Tool</A>&nbsp;or Group Policy. There are also ways to exclude it if you’re using&nbsp;<A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/configmgr/sum/deploy-use/manage-office-365-proplus-updates#deploy-office-365-apps\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager (current&nbsp;branch)</A>&nbsp;or&nbsp;<A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/intune/apps/apps-add-office365\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Microsoft Intune</A>. For more&nbsp;information&nbsp;about&nbsp;how to manage the&nbsp;extension,&nbsp;read&nbsp;<A href=\"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2109345\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">this article.&nbsp;</A></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Even if you deploy the Microsoft Search in Bing extension with Office 365 ProPlus, users will still have an opportunity to choose their search engine. The first time your users open Google Chrome after the extension for Microsoft Search in Bing is installed, they will have an option to change back their search preferences by taking a few simple steps.</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-inline\" image-alt=\"Mockup.png\" style=\"width: 975px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/166654i4F622B12179152B6/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"Mockup.png\" alt=\"Mockup of the search toggle in Chrome browsers (subject to change).\" /><span class=\"lia-inline-image-caption\" onclick=\"event.preventDefault();\">Mockup of the search toggle in Chrome browsers (subject to change).</span></span></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Learn more about the user benefits of this change by downloading the <A href=\"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=2114710\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Microsoft Search in Bing Adoption Kit</A> (zip file) and this <A href=\"https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftsearch/user-adoption-guide\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">user adoption guide</A>. As always, please visit our <A href=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/Office-365-ProPlus/bd-p/O365ProPlus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Tech Community page</A> to learn more about Office 365 ProPlus, and share your&nbsp;<A href=\"https://office365.uservoice.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">feedback and insights</A>.&nbsp;</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Footnotes</STRONG></P>\n<OL>\n<LI>This change is enabled for new and existing Office 365 ProPlus installations in Australia, Canada, France, Germany, India, the United Kingdom, and the United States. As we add locations, we will notify admins through the Message Center.<BR /><BR /></LI>\n<LI>The extension will be released to the Monthly Channel in late February 2020. Release for the Semi-Annual Channel (Targeted) and Semi-Annual Channel are coming soon.</LI>\n</OL>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Tue, 11 Feb 2020 17:14:13 +0000","feedId":10337,"bgimg":"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/166654i4F622B12179152B6/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999","linkMd5":"a8cf99b665613bcead30a3220357967d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn16@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-50-41-906_8f52a9770b0d6328.webp","destWidth":975,"destHeight":651,"sourceBytes":129940,"destBytes":22422,"author":"Office_365_Team","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/166654i4F622B12179152B6/image-size/large?v=1.0&px=999":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn16@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-50-41-906_8f52a9770b0d6328.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316639094},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:50:39","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:50:39","title":"Multi-Geo and Networking sessions at Microsoft Ignite 2018","link":"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/office-365-blog/multi-geo-and-networking-sessions-at-microsoft-ignite-2018/ba-p/252880","description":"<P><span class=\"lia-inline-image-display-wrapper lia-image-align-center\" image-alt=\"MG_Networking_Blog_Sticker.png\" style=\"width: 999px;\"><img src=\"https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/49822iB59A30AF0C1CE3FE/image-size/large?v=1.0&amp;px=999\" title=\"MG_Networking_Blog_Sticker.png\" alt=\"MG_Networking_Blog_Sticker.png\" /></span></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P>Microsoft Ignite kicks of on September 23 in Orlando with over 700+ deep-dive sessions, 100+ workshops and labs and tons of networking opportunities. It is truly the ultimate tech conference.&nbsp;</P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><SPAN>With so much going on, it can be hard to choose what to attend. Here are some awesome sessions on Multi-Geo and Office 365 networking sessions you should consider attending. And if you can't be there in person, you can always live-stream&nbsp;or watch on-demand.</SPAN></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><SPAN>Also, please come and see us in the Multi-Geo, Data Residency and Networking booth on the Ignite expo floor. See you in Orlando!</SPAN></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Multi-Geo in Office 365</STRONG></P>\n<P>BRK3376 - <A href=\"https://myignite.techcommunity.microsoft.com/sessions/65712\" target=\"_blank\">Addressing global data residency needs with Multi-Geo in Office 365</A></P>\n<P>BRK3102 - <A href=\"https://myignite.techcommunity.microsoft.com/sessions/65756\" target=\"_self\">Get started with Multi-Geo scenarios with SharePoint and OneDrive</A></P>\n<P>&nbsp;</P>\n<P><STRONG>Office 365 Networking</STRONG></P>\n<P>BRK3000 - <A href=\"https://myignite.techcommunity.microsoft.com/sessions/64275\" target=\"_blank\">Strategies for building effective, optimal and future proof connectivity that will delight your users</A></P>\n<P>BRK3081 - all through the power of AI.&nbsp;</SPAN><SPAN data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;134233117&quot;:true,&quot;134233118&quot;:true,&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</SPAN></P>\n<P><SPAN data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;134233117&quot;:true,&quot;134233118&quot;:true,&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</SPAN></P>\n<P><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">This feature allows people to enter rehearsal mode and w</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">hile</SPAN> <SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">speaking </SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">they receive on-screen </SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">feedback </SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">about </SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">pacing</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">, inclusive </SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">language</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">, use of filler words</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\"> like “um” or “uh</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">,</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">”</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\"> culturally </SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">insensitive</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\"> phrases</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\"> and, </SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">if someone is just reading their slides</SPAN><SPAN data-contrast=\"auto\">.
